author_name_ar: عبد الرحمن بن محمد بن إدريس بن المنذر الحنظلي الرازي
author_name_en: Abd al-Rahman ibn Muhammad ibn Idris al-Hanzhali al-Razi
english_translation: Mujahid said regarding the verse 'Do they not see that they are being tested' (Al-Tawbah 9:126): meaning they are being tried. Once or twice every year (Al-Tawbah 9:126) - meaning through drought and hunger.

narrators.name: Muhammad ibn al-Husayn
narrators.full_name: Muhammad ibn al-Husayn ibn Muhammad ibn Jafar al-Shibaani

narrators.name: Ibrahim ibn Fahd
narrators.full_name: Ibrahim ibn Fahd ibn Hakim ibn Ibrahim ibn Qudamah al-Basri al-Saji

narrators.name: Adam
narrators.full_name: Adam ibn Abi Iyas al-Ansari

narrators.name: Warqa'
narrators.full_name: Warqa' ibn Umar ibn al-Khattab al-Madani

narrators.name: Ibn Abi Najih
narrators.full_name: Abd al-Malik ibn Abi al-Qasim al-Madani

narrators.name: Mujahid
narrators.full_name: Mujahid ibn Jabr al-Makki

chainIssues: Chain terminates at Tabi'i Mujahid rather than reaching the Prophet ﷺ - making this Maqtu' (disconnected)
Muhammad al-Husayn and Ibrahim ibn Fahd are of unknown reliability

potential_issues.issue: Chain is Maqtu' - terminates at a Tabi'i and does not reach the Prophet ﷺ
potential_issues.impact: This is Quranic exegesis (tafsir) from Mujahid, not a hadith from the Prophet ﷺ. It cannot be used as evidence for hadith-based rulings

potential_issues.issue: Muhammad al-Husayn (the initial collector) has unknown reliability (Majhul)
potential_issues.impact: The collector's reliability is questionable, though he appears to be transmitting established tafsir

potential_issues.issue: Ibrahim ibn Fahd has unknown reliability (Majhul)
potential_issues.impact: Second narrator in chain is also of unknown status

IISGrade: Disconnections But All Narrators Are Ok
Topics: Quranic interpretation of divine testing and trials
Explanation of punishment through drought and hunger

author_name_ar: عبد الرحمن بن محمد بن إدريس بن المنذر الحنظلي الرازي
author_name_en: Abd al-Rahman ibn Muhammad ibn Idris al-Hanzhali al-Razi
english_translation: Chapter: Surah Yunus (upon him be peace).

narrators.name: Section Header
narrators.full_name: Section Header - Not a Hadith

chainIssues: This is a section header, not an actual hadith entry

potential_issues.issue: This is a chapter/section header, not a hadith
potential_issues.impact: No chain of narration; serves as organizational marker in the tafsir work

IISGrade: Disconnections But All Narrators Are Ok

author_name_ar: عبد الرحمن بن محمد بن إدريس بن المنذر الحنظلي الرازي
author_name_en: Abd al-Rahman ibn Muhammad ibn Idris al-Hanzhali al-Razi
english_translation: Mujahid said regarding the verse 'And give good tidings to those who have believed - that for them is a position of honor with their Lord' (Yunus 10:2): that for them is goodness with their Lord.

narrators.name: Muhammad ibn al-Husayn
narrators.full_name: Muhammad ibn al-Husayn ibn Muhammad ibn Jafar al-Shibaani

Transmission term variation: First narrator uses 'akhbarana' (أَخْبَرَنَا) instead of 'haddathana' - less direct form of transmission

potential_issues.issue: Chain is Maqtu' - does not reach the Prophet ﷺ
potential_issues.impact: This is Quranic exegesis from a Tabi'i scholar, not a hadith from the Prophet ﷺ

potential_issues.issue: Muhammad al-Husayn uses 'akhbarana' instead of 'haddathana'
potential_issues.impact: Less direct transmission form, though not critical for tafsir transmission

potential_issues.issue: Muhammad al-Husayn and Ibrahim ibn Fahd have unknown reliability
potential_issues.impact: The initial two transmitters in the chain are of unknown status (Majhul)

IISGrade: Disconnections But All Narrators Are Ok
Topics: Quranic interpretation of glad tidings to believers
Explanation of honor and goodness with Allah

author_name_ar: عبد الرحمن بن محمد بن إدريس بن المنذر الحنظلي الرازي
author_name_en: Abd al-Rahman ibn Muhammad ibn Idris al-Hanzhali al-Razi
english_translation: Mujahid said regarding the verse 'He conducts all affairs' (Yunus 10:3): He decrees all matters by Himself alone.

author_name_ar: عبد الرحمن بن محمد بن إدريس بن المنذر الحنظلي الرازي
author_name_en: Abd al-Rahman ibn Muhammad ibn Idris al-Hanzhali al-Razi
english_translation: Mujahid said regarding the verse 'Indeed, He originates creation and then reproduces it' (Yunus 10:4): He creates it, then causes it to die, then reproduces it - meaning He gives it life.

author_name_ar: عبد الرحمن بن محمد بن إدريس بن المنذر الحنظلي الرازي
author_name_en: Abd al-Rahman ibn Muhammad ibn Idris al-Hanzhali al-Razi
english_translation: Mujahid said regarding the verse 'And they were satisfied with the worldly life and became complacent in it' (Yunus 10:7): It is like His saying 'Whoever desires the worldly life and its adornments, We will repay them for their deeds in it' (Hud 11:15) - the rest of the verse.

author_name_en: Abd al-Rahman ibn Muhammad ibn Idris al-Hanzhali al-Razi
english_translation: Mujahid said regarding the verse 'Their Lord will guide them by their faith' (Yunus 10:9): Their faith will become a light for them by which they walk.

author_name_ar: عبد الرحمن بن محمد بن إدريس بن المنذر الحنظلي الرازي
author_name_en: Abd al-Rahman ibn Muhammad ibn Idris al-Hanzhali al-Razi
english_translation: Mujahid said regarding the verse 'And if Allah were to hasten upon people the evil they demand' (Yunus 10:11): This is like when a man says to his son or family or wealth when he is angry with them: 'O Allah, do not bless it, O Allah curse it.' He would say: if that were hastened for him, then their lifespan would be fulfilled - meaning whoever invoked upon him would be destroyed and killed.

author_name_ar: عبد الرحمن بن محمد بن إدريس بن المنذر الحنظلي الرازي
author_name_en: Abd al-Rahman ibn Muhammad ibn Idris al-Hanzhali al-Razi
english_translation: Mujahid said regarding the verse 'And mankind was not except as one nation, then they divided' (Yunus 10:19): By mankind is meant Adam alone, then they divided - meaning when the son of Adam killed his brother.

author_name_ar: عبد الرحمن بن محمد بن إدريس بن المنذر الحنظلي الرازي
author_name_en: Abd al-Rahman ibn Muhammad ibn Idris al-Hanzhali al-Razi
english_translation: Mujahid said regarding the verse 'When there is scheming against Our verses' (Yunus 10:21): Meaning mockery of the Messengers ﷺ and denial of the Qur'an.

author_name_ar: عبد الرحمن بن محمد بن إدريس بن المنذر الحنظلي الرازي
author_name_en: Abd al-Rahman ibn Muhammad ibn Idris al-Hanzhali al-Razi
english_translation: Mujahid said regarding the verse 'If we were indeed heedless of your worship' (Yunus 10:29): This is the statement of everything that was worshipped besides Allah the Mighty and Majestic.
